TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormattedText extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides low-level control for drawing text in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

span.span: Provides low-level control for drawing text in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象允许你绘制多行文本，在其中每个字符文本中的可以单独设置格式。The object allows you to draw multi-line text, in which each character in the text can be individually formatted. 下例演示应用了多种格式的文本。The following example shows text that has several formats applied to it. ![使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "使用 FormattedText 对象显示的文本")![Text displayed using FormattedText object](~/add/media/formattedtext01.jpg "Text displayed using FormattedText object") 格式化的文本字符串的示例Example of a formatted text string 在文本中的功能方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，被视为"低级别"，因为它作为图形元素处理文本。In terms of text features in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], is considered "low-level" because it processes text as graphical elements. 中的文本的其他方面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]处理专用于文本的控件的上下文中的文本 (， )，实现流文档模型 (请参阅[流文档概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md))，或支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档模型 (请参阅[WPF 中的文档](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md))。Other aspects of text in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] handle text in the context of controls that are dedicated to text (, ), implement the flow document model (see [Flow Document Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md)), or support the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document model (see [Documents in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/documents-in-wpf.md)). 中的 setter 方法的许多具有到支持的附加属性的相似之处，但附加的属性应用于的更高级别的文本支持为流或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]。Many of the setter methods in have similarities to attached properties that are supported by , but the attached properties apply to the higher-level text support either for flow or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，然后将几种格式设置样式应用于的文本。The following example creates a object and then applies several formatting styles to the text. [!code-csharp[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#formattedtextsnippets1)] [!code-vb[FormattedTextSnippets#FormattedTextSnippets1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FormattedTextSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#formattedtextsnippets1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文本转换为对象，它不再是字符的集合，无法修改的文本字符串中的字符。When text is converted to a object, it is no longer a collection of characters—you cannot modify the characters in the text string. 但是，可修改已转换文本的笔划和填充属性，以此来影响该文本的外观。However, you can affect the appearance of the converted text by modifying its stroke and fill properties. 下面的示例说明了多种方法可以通过修改的笔画和填充的已转换的文本来创建视觉效果。The following examples illustrate several ways of creating visual effects by modifying the stroke and fill of converted text. ![对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "对填充和笔画使用不同颜色的文本")![Text with different colors for fill and stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext03.jpg "Text with different colors for fill and stroke") 将笔划和填充设置为不同颜色的示例Example of setting stroke and fill to different colors ![笔画应用了图像画笔的文本](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "笔画应用了图像画笔的文本")![Text with image brush applied to stroke](~/add/media/outlinedtext04.jpg "Text with image brush applied to stroke") 笔划应用了图像画笔的示例Example of an image brush applied to the stroke 转换为和呈现为文本对象可能不会被视为直接呈现的文本：Text that is converted to and rendered as a object may not look the same as text rendered directly: - 文本转换为不使用 ClearType 呈现对象。Text converted to a object is not rendered using ClearType. 此外，转换后的基线不对齐到整个显示像素。In addition, the baseline of the converted is not snapped to a whole display pixel. - 小字体，例如通常使用的正文，可能会丢失易读性，显示和经过模糊处理，和在外观上有所不同。Small fonts, such as those commonly used in body text, may lose legibility, appear blurred, and vary in appearance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象并检索带格式的文本和其边界框的几何图形。The following example shows how to create a object and to retrieve the geometries of the formatted text and its bounding box. [!code-csharp[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/CSharp/OutlineTextControl.cs#createtext)] [!code-vb[OutlineTextControlViewer#CreateText](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OutlineTextControlViewer/visualbasic/outlinetextcontrol.vb#createtext)]

span.span: Returns a object that represents the highlight bounding box of the formatted text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本会换行以避免超过限制。Text will wrap to avoid exceeding the limit. 必须在行的计数限制内保持标志符号对齐边缘。Glyph alignment edges must be kept within the line count limits. 由于许多字体包含略微延伸出它们的对齐边缘的标志符号，允许至少为 1/6 em （字体大小） 边距的行计数之外请求，为这类延伸留出空间。Because many fonts contain glyphs that slightly overhang their alignment edges, allow at least 1/6 em (font size) margin beyond the line count requested, to leave room for such overhangs. 行计数的零值视为无限行计数。A zero value for line count is treated as an infinite line count. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，然后将几种格式设置样式应用于文本，包括。The following example creates a object and then applies several formatting styles to the text, including .
